column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: A Korean man was arrested on April 4 at 11:30 in a Sangkat 3 casino.------KIM KEY HYUN
column5: was arrested on a court issued warrant No 801MH / 019
column6: dated 12 July 2019.------He was wanted for violating the laws of the Republic of Korea National sports sector (*gambling) from 29.07.2015 to 03.11.2016 in Korea.------The accused was taken to the Office of the Criminal Investigation Bureau for a criminal case to be sent to the provincial court. KPSBN
